description: This requirement is for Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), Valcartier Research Center, for the services of one (1) TSPS resource category 5.3 Engineering Graduate, Intermediate Level under Stream 5: Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) to provide the Weapon Effects and Protection (WEP) section with specialist engineering support and services in the field of anti-warheads and anti-armours system development and evaluation.  The intent of this solicitation is to establish one (1) Contract for six (6) months, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to three (3) one-year option periods under the same conditions. This solicitation is only open to the list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) who are qualified under Tier 1.

# Tender Announcement for TSPS Engineering Support

## Summary

Bidder information

* **Reference Number**: cb-5934-78033329
* **Contractor Reference Number**: DRDC Valencia PES 20-10-23-110
* **Solicitation Number**: 2023-15579
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-29
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-14 14:00:00
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-06-14

**Tender Overview**

Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) – Valcartier Research Centre is soliciting bids for professional engineering services to provide specialist engineering support and services in the field of anti-warheads and anti-armour systems. The successful bidder will be required to provide one (1) TSPS resource category 5.3 Engineering Graduate, Intermediate Level, for six (6) months, with an option to extend the term by up to three (3) one-year period.

## Selection Criteria and Requirements

* **Technical Specifications**: The bidder must provide evidence of being qualified under Tier 1 in the Task and Services Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS).
* **Delivery**: Services will be delivered in Quebec.
* **Language**: [The bidder must be able to provide services in English and/or French]

## Tender Status

The tender is **Expired**. 

## Evaluation and Contract Duration

The contract duration will be for six (6) months, with the option to extend for up to three (3) one-year periods.
